properties.name: BackendID
properties.description: Identifier of the order from the 3rd party

properties.name: BackendSystemID
properties.description: Identifier of the 3rd party system that created the order

properties.name: Lines
properties.description:
Contents of the purchase order.
Note: Only one key property can be used to identify the product. When different properties are used, the request will be invalid.
This will become redundant when ProductID is the only property left.

properties.name: ShipToOrganizationUnitID
properties.description: OrganizationUnit that will be receiving the purchase order shipment(s).
